meanings.definition: One that makes a match or is suitable for matching.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle matcher found the missing piece.
meanings.sent2: The job matcher connected candidates with employers.
meanings.sent3: The sock matcher always pairs up socks in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The key matcher unlocked the mystery of the old chest.
meanings.sent5: The color matcher ensured all the paint shades matched perfectly.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that matches.
meanings.sent1: The sock matcher paired socks by color and pattern.
meanings.sent2: The team captain was a great matcher for the team's spirit.
meanings.sent3: The food matcher always knew the perfect wine to go with a meal.
meanings.sent4: The music matcher could identify any song just by hearing a few notes.
meanings.sent5: The job matcher had a talent for finding the right fit for every applicant.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is identical or similar to another.
meanings.sent1: The twin sisters were perfect matchers in looks and personality.
meanings.sent2: The new phone model was a close matcher to the previous version.
meanings.sent3: The cloud matcher saw shapes in the sky that resembled animals.
meanings.sent4: The artist was a skilled matcher of colors in his paintings.
meanings.sent5: The handwriting matcher could tell who wrote a note just by the style.
